title: Book a Hotel Conference Room
description: A company needs to book a conference room for a half-day meeting for 10 people.

tasks.description: Check the availability of conference rooms that can accommodate 10 people.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an available conference room for the requested date and time.

tasks.description: Provide the client with the half-day rental rate and any available add-ons (e.g., coffee service, projector).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives a clear quote for the room and optional services.

tasks.description: Create a booking for the conference room and send a confirmation to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reserves the room and provides a confirmation.
